txt.en: 'Are you looking to be welcomed into the inner circle of Minas Tirith? I can help you with that and make you \qKindred\q to the Defenders of Minas Tirith.\n\n'If this sounds good to you, speak to me again!'
'Alright, soon you will be Kindred to the Defenders of Minas Tirith. Ready?'
Old An√≥rien - Defenders of Minas Tirith IV
Talk to the friendly rep Man to continue
By completing this quest, you will be considered Kindred to the Defenders of Minas Tirith.
